pageTitle: The Prime Minister announces a change in the senior ranks of the Public Service | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today announced the following change in the senior ranks of the Public Service:

Shawn Tupper, currently Assistant Secretary to the Cabinet, Economic and Regional Development Policy, Privy Council Office, becomes Associate Deputy Minister of Natural Resources, effective November 5, 2018.

Biographical notes

  • Shawn Tupper
